titles.title: Public Housing Fair Compensation Act of 1993
To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise the method of calculating the amounts paid by public housing agencies in lieu of State, city, county, and local taxes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Public Housing Fair Compensation Act of 1993 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise the method of calculating the amounts paid by public housing agencies in lieu of State and local real and personal property taxes. Authorizes appropriations for such payments.
